select id, name, code, address, principal, phone, content, operate_day, operate_start_time, operate_end_time, images, create_date, status, dishes, longitude, latitude from merchant_info where 1 = 1
AND code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{merchantInfo.code},'%')
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{merchantInfo.name},'%')
AND principal LIKE CONCAT('%',#{merchantInfo.principal},'%')
order by create_date desc
